meanings.definition: A person who hikes as a recreational activity.
meanings.sent1: The hikers enjoyed the beautiful nature trail.
meanings.sent2: Many hikers visit the national park on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The hikers laughed when they saw a squirrel trying to hike up a tree.
meanings.sent4: The group of hikers moved through the forest like a line of ants.
meanings.sent5: The hikers' backpacks were filled with snacks and water for the journey.

meanings.definition: A group of people who hike together.
meanings.sent1: The hikers set off on the trail early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: We met a friendly group of hikers at the mountain summit.
meanings.sent3: The hikers cheered each other on as they climbed a steep hill.
meanings.sent4: The hikers moved in unison, like a flock of birds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The group of hikers shared stories around the campfire at night.
